BlackStorm:

The femme was almost shocked... she was married with the enemy boss 
and she had a daugther with...  She felt stunned and confused... Now 
what???? If hydras knew that she knows about her past she might be in 
danger... If she left the base she WOULD be in danger and she didn't 
have a place to go... Plus.. She was starting to wish to know her 
daughter


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Hamre Will <kaiserponth@y...> wrote:
> 
> ::Hevn::
> 
>      He sighs.  "Blackstorm, I really have no way of knowing.  I 
can only guess that you were a target of oportunity.  He needed a 
hostage to escape.  The fact that the hostage was you was just a 
bonus, or so I would guess."  He shrugs.  "I'm sorry I don't know 
more.  But I really wasn't kept very informed of the happenings at 
the Maximal base."
>
